solution_line_template: He ran the 10 kilometers in a total of {first_half_time} + {second_half_time} = <<{first_half_time}+{second_half_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes.
Therefore, he ran at a pace of {total_time} minutes / {total_distance} kilometers = <<{total_time}/{total_distance}={avg_time_per_km}>>{avg_time_per_km} minutes per kilometer.
